title: Autobiography Memories and Experiences, Volume 1
creator: Moncure D. Conway
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text
description: LibriVox recording of Autobiography Memories and Experiences, Volume 1, by Moncure D. Conway. Read by volunteer readers. Moncure Daniel Conway was an American abolitionist, Unitarian, clergyman and author. This first volume of his autobiography covers roughly the years of his birth through the end of the US Civil War. (Summary by JoeD) For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording. For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org. M4B format available
subject: LibriVox; audiobook; biography; autobiography; slavery; abolitionist; politics; religion; Methodism; Ralph Waldo Emerson; Nathaniel Hawthorne; Civil War
